doc.title: Designing the New World: Turning Crisis Into Potential
doc.plot: There has never been a more exciting time to live, allowing new and old generations alike to rethink and redesign the way we live our lives on a personal, economic and global level. Designing the New World sheds light on a few of these exciting opportunities in order to inspire, educate and motivate the viewer. OUR GOAL IS TO: - To redefine the term "crisis" and approach it as potential. - To inspire people to rethink, recreate and redesign the way we live on a personal, economic and global level - not through fear-based tactics - but through inspiring stories of progress and success.
